sentences.en: According to one survey, one woman in eight is infertile.
sentences.cn: 有调查显示, 8名妇女中有一名不育.

sentences.en: After treatment, 3 of 8 infertile women were pregnant , the pregnancy rate was 37.5 %.
sentences.cn: 8例未生育患者治疗后3例妊娠,占37.5%.

sentences.en: And in unclear infertile women, it reaches to 70 % ~80 % . Statistically.
sentences.cn: 在不明原因的不孕妇女中则高达70%～80%.

sentences.en: Harvests are poor in this infertile area.
sentences.cn: 这块贫瘠的土地上收成不好.

sentences.en: In 941 infertile women, the positive rate of AsAb , EmAb , AoAb , HCGAb, ATAb , ACA was 19.34 %, 11.05 %, 10.31 % , 7.26 % and 15.30 %, respectively.
Infertile women have a somewhat higher risk of developing breast cancer.
sentences.cn: 不育妇女患乳癌的倾向性较高.

sentences.en: Infertile women with normal menstrual cycle were selected as control group C.
sentences.cn: 月经周期正常妇女27例设为C组.

sentences.en: It has been estimated that one in eight couples is infertile.
sentences.cn: 据估计每八对夫妇中就有一对不育.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the diagnosis value of pelviscopy on infertile women pelvic factors.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨腹腔镜检查对不孕妇女盆腔因素的诊断价值.

sentences.en: Plants can't grow well in the infertile land.
sentences.cn: 在贫瘠的土地上庄稼长不好.

sentences.en: She is now in early menopause and infertile herself.
sentences.cn: 她现在是早期绝经,并且不孕.

sentences.en: The land became infertile during the nineteen seventies and early eighties.
sentences.cn: 在二十世纪70年代到80年代,土地曾一度异常贫瘠.

sentences.en: The polluted waste is often dumped, making the surrounding land infertile.
sentences.cn: 被污染的废物经常被随意倒掉，周边土地因此而变得很贫瘠。

sentences.en: The pregnancy rate after surgery in 7 infertile women was 57.1 %.
Utilization of the land which leaves it in an infertile condition is considered pollution.
sentences.cn: 把土地使用到非常贫瘠的程度被认为是一种污染.

words.tran_cn: 不肥沃的；不毛的；不结果实的；不能生殖的

trans.tran_cn: 不能生育的，不结果实的，贫瘠的，不毛的
trans.tran_en: infertile land or soil is not good enough to grow plants in
